description: Represents a router network interface in AWS Elemental MediaConnect that is used to define a network boundary for router resources

PublicRouterNetworkInterfaceConfiguratio.description: The configuration settings for a public router network interface, including the list of allowed CIDR blocks.

AllowRules.description: The list of allowed CIDR blocks for the public router network interface.
AllowRules.markdownDescription:
The list of allowed CIDR blocks for the public router network interface.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

PublicRouterNetworkInterfaceConfiguratio.markdownDescription:
The configuration settings for a public router network interface, including the list of allowed CIDR blocks.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

PublicRouterNetworkInterfaceRule.description: A rule that allows a specific CIDR block to access the public router network interface.

Cidr.description: The CIDR block that is allowed to access the public router network interface.
Cidr.markdownDescription:
The CIDR block that is allowed to access the public router network interface.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Required: No  
Type: String

Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes
